Here’s a concise, professional draft you could send. I’ve kept the description of Emily’s circumstances brief and focused on the academic impact to respect her privacy.

–––  
Subject: Request for Academic Consideration on Behalf of Emily Carter  

Dear Professor Smith,

I hope you are well. I am writing on behalf of Emily Carter (ECON 402) to let you know she recently experienced a serious personal emergency that has significantly affected her well-being and her ability to prepare for coursework and exams.

Given these unforeseen circumstances, Emily would be grateful for any flexibility you can offer on upcoming deadlines or assessments—particularly the advanced economics test scheduled last week. She is committed to making up missed work as soon as she is able and is actively working with campus support resources.

Please let us know if you would like any additional documentation or if there is a formal process Emily should follow to request accommodations.

Thank you very much for your understanding and support.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]  
[Your Title / Role, if relevant]  
[Your Contact Information]  
–––

Next steps  
1. Let me know Professor Smith’s email address (and CC/BCC recipients, if any).  
2. Confirm any wording changes you’d like, and I’ll send the email through your Gmail account.
